Package ulb.infof307.g10.app.controllers

package ulb.infof307.g10.app.controllers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ConnectionController
    The purpose of this class is to control the connections in views.
    DeckController
    This class controls the decks
    MainController
    The main class of the application.
    PacketController
    The purpose of this class is to exchange information with the server.
    StoreController
    This class is the controller passed to store view
    WindowController
    This class controls which window is shown
